name: full_stack_open_part3
description: Exercises for part 3 of online course Full stack open 2020 (https://fullstackopen.com/en/)

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../full_stack_open_2020/part3/phonebook_front && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../full_stack_open_part3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: Laura Blanch
